feed.title: Combined summary - Payment processors that support testnet?

entry.title: Combined summary - Payment processors that support testnet?
entry.summary: A user on Reddit has posted a question regarding the ability to test end-to-end transactions from Bitcoin to fiat currency. The user noted that credit card payment processor APIs have features for developers to test without using real money, but the equivalent for Bitcoin is unclear. However, Bitcoin to fiat currency processors such as BitPay and Coinbase do allow testing using the Bitcoin testnet. This provides a way for developers to test transactions without using real money, similar to the feature available in credit card payment processor APIs.
